Package dev.majek.hexnicks.server

Interface ServerSoftware

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaperServer, SpigotServer
    public interface ServerSoftware
extends org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Handles different server software.
